metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7999 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: In libgraphite2 in graphite2 1.3.11, a NULL pointer dereference vulnerability was found in Segment.cpp during a dumbRendering operation, which may allow attackers to cause a denial of service or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted .ttf file.

criterions.comment: graphite2 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.11-2').
